issue.title: FCD Ballot Comment US-184
issue.discussion: It is unclear when a thread::id ceases to be meaningful. The sentence "The library may reuse the value of a thread::id of a terminated thread that can no longer be joined." implies that some terminated threads can be joined. It says nothing about detached threads.
issue.resolution: Require a unique thread::id for every thread that is (1) detached and not terminated or (2) has an associated std::thread object.
